See note in Log Book, page 8.
See note in Log Book, page 9 saying that, on 7 October, Daniel Evans was unable to do duty owing to symptoms of fever. He was taken to Baltimore Infirmary.
See note in Log Book, page 8.
See note in Log Book, page 9.
See note in Log Book, page 10.
See note in Log Book, page 9 saying that, on 7 October, Frett Hlastrils was unable to do duty owing to a swelling in his groin. On 10 October, he was discharged owing to illness.
See note in Log Book, page 10.
See note in Log Book, page 10.
